==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|よう|せい|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ようせい}} compound {{m|zh|要請|tr=ʔjiew tshjeng<sup>X</sup>|lit=demand + request}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{zh-l|要請|tr=yāojí|request; require}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|yomi=o|ようせい|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ようせい|hhira=えうせい}}

# an official [[request]] (of something that has to be done)

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|要望|ようぼう}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|ようせい|hhira=えうせい|tr=trans}}

# to [[request]] officially for something or to do something that has to be done
#: {{ja-usex|政府は捕虜の解放を'''要請'''した。|^せいふ は ほりょ の かいほう を '''ようせい''' した。|The government '''called for''' / '''requested''' the release of the prisoners of war.}}
